mandatory.description: The target url for the scan.

optional.description: The configuration of the web scan.
Active scanning uses known attacks against targets. If this option is enabled OWASP ZAP will actively attack the target.
The AJAX crawler can crawl single-page and JavaScript pages. In case, this option is enabled the scanning will take more time.
Enable/disable proxy for scanning.
Hostname or address of proxy.
Port of proxy.
Use proxy for PDS target type: INTERNET or INTRANET.
Comma separated list of rule references that will be deactivated during the scan.
Enable/disable initial connection done by the Owasp Zap wrapper.
Maximum amount of retries the wrapper does for each URL to check if it is reachable.
The time to wait between connection checks to the same URL. The value cannot be less than 1000 milliseconds.
